connector.description:
Consume Changes from a CosmosDB instance.

There are two different mechanism of authentication `SHARED_ACCOUNT_KEY` and `AZURE_IDENTITY`, you could specify with credentialType property. If you're using `SHARED_ACCOUNT_KEY` accountKey property will be needed.

In case of `AZURE_IDENTITY` selection, the DefaultAzureCredential will attempt to authenticate via the following mechanisms in the following order enviroment, Workload Identity, Managed Identity, Azure Developer CLI, IntelliJ, Azure CLI and Azure Powershell.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leas.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leaseDatabaseName
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leas.description: Sets the lease container which acts as a state storage and coordinates processing the change feed across multiple workers.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leas.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leaseContainerName
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.leas.description: Sets the lease database where the leaseContainerName will be stored.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.crea.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.createLeaseDatabaseIfNotExists
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.crea.description: Sets if the component should create Cosmos lease database for the consumer automatically in case it doesn’t exist in Cosmos account.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.crea.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.createLeaseContainerIfNotExists
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.crea.description: Sets if the component should create Cosmos lease container for the consumer automatically in case it doesn’t exist in Cosmos database.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.data.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.databaseEndpoint
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.data.description: Sets the Azure Cosmos database endpoint the component will connect to.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.cred.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-source.cred.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt.
